not_found.name: Unknown
description: Unable to find the requested paladin mercy.

abundant_step.name: Deceived
description: The target can immediately attempt a new saving throw to disbelieve any ongoing illusions that it failed to disbelieve within the last minute.

fatigued.name: Fatigued
description: The target is no longer fatigued.

riled.name: riled
description: The paladin's lay on hands also acts as {spell/calm emotions}, but only for the purpose of suppressing morale bonuses (such as from the {spell/rage} spell) and emotion effects that aren't fear effects. Use the paladin's level as the caster level.

shaken.name: Shaken
description: The target is no longer shaken.

sickened.name: Sickened
description: The target is no longer sickened.

dazed.name: Dazed
description: The target is no longer dazed.

diseased.name: Diseased
description: The paladin's lay on hands ability also acts as {spell/remove disease}, using the paladin's level as the caster level.

enfeebled.name: Enfeebled
description: The paladin {spell/dispel/s>_magic} any magical effects that are reducing one of the target's ability scores (paladin's choice).

haunted.name: Haunted
description: The paladin's lay on hands also acts as {spell/protection from evil}, but only for the purpose of allowing a new saving throw against enchantment (charm) and enchantment (compulsion) effects, making the target immune to any attempts to possess or exercise mental control over the target, or preventing a life force from controlling the target (all as described in the second effect of protection from evil). Use the paladin's level as the caster level.

staggered.name: Staggered
description: The target is no longer staggered, unless the target is at exactly 0 hit points.

targeted.name: Targeted
description: The paladin's lay on hands also acts as {spell/sanctuary}, using the paladin's level as the caster level. The saving throw DC to negate this effect is equal to 10 + 1/2 the paladin's level + the paladin's Charisma modifier.

confused.name: Confused
description: The target is no longer confused.

cursed.name: Cursed
description: The paladin's lay on hands ability also acts as {spell/remove curse}, using the paladin's level as the caster level.

exhausted.name: Exhausted
description: The target is no longer exhausted. The paladin must have the {mercy/fatigue} mercy before selecting this mercy.

frightened.name: Frightened
description: The target is no longer frightened. The paladin must have the {mercy/shaken} mercy before selecting this mercy.

injured.name: Injured
description: The target gains {umr/fast healing} 3 for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 the paladin's level.

nauseated.name: Nauseated
description: The target is no longer nauseated. The paladin must have the {mercy/sickened} mercy before selecting this mercy.

poisoned.name: Poisoned
description: The paladin's lay on hands ability also acts as {spell/neutralize poison}, using the paladin's level as the caster level.

amputated.name: Amputated
description: The paladin's lay on hands also acts as {spell/regenerate}, but only for the purposes of regrowing severed body members, broken bones, and ruined organs. The paladin must have the {mercy/injured} mercy before she can select this mercy.

blinded.name: Blinded
description: The target is no longer blinded.

deafened.name: Deafened
description: The target is no longer deafened.

ensorcelled.name: Ensorcelled
description: The paladin's lay on hands also acts as {spell/dispel magic}, using the paladin's level as her caster level (maximum 20).

paralyzed.name: Paralyzed
description: The target is no longer paralyzed.

petrified.name: Petrified
description: The paladin's lay on hands ability also acts as {spell/stone to flesh}, but only for the purpose of removing the petrified condition from a creature.

stunned.name: Stunned
description: The target is no longer stunned.
